short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you tired of endlessly clicking Next to find a specific question?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "NBME Next Clicker" extension addresses a common frustration with poorly designed UI in online tests, where you can't directly navigate to a specific question. Instead, you are forced to click "Next" repeatedly until you reach your desired question. This can be time-consuming and inefficient, especially for long tests.

With the "NBME Next Clicker," you can automate this process effortlessly:

Enter the Target Question: Simply input the section number and item number of the question you want to navigate to.
Start the Automation: Click the "Start" button, and the extension will automatically click "Next" for you, stopping when it reaches the specified question.
Stop Anytime: Need to halt the process? Click the "Stop" button to pause the automation at any time.

Features:

-Automates the process of navigating to a specific question in large tests.
-Logs the current section and item number in the console for easy tracking.
-Simple and intuitive interface to set your target section and item number.
-Save time and reduce frustration with automated clicking.
